Cost of living in Bali for families: a decision framework

A budgeting framework that explains why costs vary—and how to compare options without guessing.

#costs#budget#planning#families
Pillar: Costs & budgeting for a Bali move

Quick take

Two families can live in the “same Bali” and spend wildly different amounts. Costs mostly come from: housing expectations, transport style, and school/camp choices.

A useful budgeting framework

Step 1: Write your non-negotiables

Examples:

  • Walkable mornings
  • Quiet at night
  • A kitchen that makes home meals easy

Step 2: Choose your “big three” cost drivers

For most families:

  • Housing
  • School / learning
  • Lifestyle (restaurants, activities, travel)

Step 3: Build a range (not a single number)

Use a low / mid / high range so you can adapt.

Next steps

  • Pillar: Costs
  • Pillar: Areas
